SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.customcomponents.animations

Class MyShelfieScaleTransition

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.customcomponents.animations.MyShelfieScaleTransition
All Implemented Interfaces:
MyShelfieTransition
public class MyShelfieScaleTransition extends Object implements MyShelfieTransition
This class is used to create a smooth scale transition of the element on which the resulting animation will be applied
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getTransition

      public javafx.animation.ScaleTransition getTransition()
      Retrieves the "My Shelfie" style transition associated with the class

      More precisely in this case the transition will scale the graphical element from a starting X and starting Y values and stops when end X and end Y values will be reached

      Specified by:
      getTransition in interface MyShelfieTransition
      Returns:
      the scale transition of the element from the starting X and Y values to the ending X and Y values
